title: Chapter 4295 - Chapter 4295: 4294 Treasure Hunt! Go
body:
Chapter 4295 - Chapter 4295: 4294 Treasure Hunt! Go

Chapter 4295: 4294 treasure hunt! Go

Translator: 549690339

“There are still too few treasures that can be used by Great Dao level powerhouses!”

Wang Xian looked around and kept dodging the attacks of the chaos stones as he spoke!

The higher he went, the more difficult it became.

Looking into the depths, Wang Xian continued to fly.

There was no danger for him here.

The deeper he went, the greater the chances of obtaining treasures!

He kept flying forward. Soon, Wang Xian arrived at a deeper area.

Chaotic Quicksand!

This quicksand was densely packed. It was almost impossible to avoid it. He could only withstand it head-on.

Among the quicksand, there were all kinds of chaos stones.

What was very peculiar was that they seemed to revolve around a certain center.

At the periphery, some chaos stones were being sucked into it.

“There are some small-scale fragments of the Elemental God!”

When Wang Xian approached the periphery, he noticed some fragments of the elemental god as well as some pure attribute chaos stones!

“As expected, the closer I get to the center, the more treasures there are. However, I’m afraid it’s a little dangerous inside!”

Wang Xian stared at the spot in front of him.

The spot he was at now was the very core!

The chaotic sand flow, the terrifying chaotic stone in the sand flow.

All kinds of violent energy!

Some of the sand flow even contained strange energy, making one’s heart palpitate!

Wang Xian’s entire body was wrapped in energy as he tried to enter the sand flow!

When he entered the sand flow, he felt a continuous stream of terrifying energy attacking him.

This kind of attack was continuous.

Although the impact of the sand flow was only equivalent to a control level existence.

However, this kind of impact was long-lasting and continuous!

“I can only stay here for more than 20 hours at most, and this is without encountering the impact of large-scale chaos stones!”

At this moment, Wang Xian had a solemn expression on his face.

The impact of the energy here was too terrifying.

Wang Xian could only last for more than 20 hours here.

According to Wang Xian’s speculation, Saint Shan Tian could only last for more than 10 hours here!

“His star field might have been destroyed here!”

Wang Xian guessed in his heart.

A power at the level of Great Dao could destroy the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin!

The destructive power here could also be destroyed over a long period of time!

Wang Xian’s entire body was wrapped in energy as he charged towards a fragment of the god of elements.

The powerful impact of the energy made his speed extremely slow!

Meanwhile, that fragment of the god of elements was still moving forward at a rapid speed!

However, this place was located at the periphery. Fortunately, Wang Xian managed to catch up with that fragment of the god of elements.

Holding it in his hand, Wang Xian looked at the other fragments of the god of elements and the special chaos stones. They had already disappeared!

They were mixed in the quicksand. They would appear in one second and disappear in the next!

It was very difficult to find them!

“This won’t do. This area is very big. I Can’t stay here forever!”

Wang Xian frowned slightly.

This place was more dangerous than he had imagined.

Wang Xian was already very strong, but he wouldn’t be able to hold out here for long.

He wouldn’t be able to enter this place if he was at the weak control level!

With a movement, Wang Xian hurriedly flew out of this immeasurable area.

Looking at this area, he frowned slightly.

As expected, it was not easy to obtain all the treasures!

I have to make use of my advantage. I Can’t just blindly search here

Wang Xian thought to himself.

He had an advantage that other experts did not have. That was because he could enter the area of the Elemental God!

Especially when he entered the area of two or three elemental gods who were constantly colliding.

The stronger the area where the elemental gods were clashing against each other, the easier it was for Wang Xian to obtain powerful treasures!

This was his greatest advantage when compared to other Great Dao level experts!

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian began to fly around this area.

There were also elemental gods among the chaotic currents.

Furthermore, they were elemental gods of Great Dao level. As long as he could touch them, he would be able to enter the area.

Perhaps he would be able to obtain some benefits!

Wang Xian began to fly around this area.

“Roar!”

When he was flying around this area for more than ten days, a roar suddenly came from within!

This made Wang Xian’s eyes freeze slightly!

“There are giant beasts of chaos in the quicksand region. The giant beasts of chaos that are able to survive here are definitely extremely powerful Great Dao existences!”

Wang Xian had a solemn expression on his face.

If they were able to survive in the quicksand region, the gigantic beasts of primordial chaos in there would probably be no weaker than Wang Xian!

After all, Wang Xian could not stay in this region for a long time!

“I need to be careful of such gigantic beasts of Primordial Chaos!”

Wang Xian was on high alert as he continued to fly around this region!

However, when Wang Xian had been circling this area for a year, he realized that the area of this quicksand region was extremely terrifying!

“It’s much bigger than I imagined.”

He continued to fly around this area.

However, his eyes suddenly lit up as he looked ahead.

Wang Xian saw some light in the interior of the quicksand ahead.

The white and black rays of light were colliding and distorting!

“The god of light and the God of Darkness!”

Wang Xian was certain in his heart as his eyes lit up.

This was what he was looking for!

An elemental god that could stand in the quicksand of chaos and emit such a large amount of light must be at the Great Dao level.

In other words, these were two great dao levels.

As long as he could enter the quicksand, he would have a chance to obtain something!

And for an elemental god of such a high level to obtain a treasure, the value would definitely be extremely high!

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian directly entered the quicksand!

The violent energy surged into his body, and Wang Xian immediately unleashed his strongest defense.

This was to prevent the quicksand from containing special energy.

This was the information that Wang Xian had obtained from his observation of the quicksand over the past year.

The quicksand was far more dangerous than he had imagined.

There was a peculiar and terrifying energy in the quicksand.

He had to guard against this energy!

Wang Xian entered the quicksand and flew rapidly towards the bright and dark spots.

After passing through the quicksand, Wang Xian arrived in front of the two elemental gods!

The power of light and darkness filled the area in front of him. Wang Xian realized that the power of light and darkness had opened up a separate space in the torrent.

There was no quicksand in this space.

This was good news for Wang Xian!

However, although there was no quicksand, Wang Xian could sense that there were some terrifying light and dark substances in it.

These substances were not simple!
